title: QSML
description: QuickStatements Macro Language: speed up your QuickStatements by using macros
name: hay-qsml
author: Hay Kranen

title: Tinklify
description: Get all links from a Wikimedia page and transform to Wikidata items (QIDs)
name: hay-tinklify
author: Hay Kranen

title: Minefield
description: Convert Commons file page titles to media ids
name: hay-minefield
author: Hay Kranen

title: Close to me
description: See Wikidata items close to you.
name: hay-closetome
author: Hay Kranen

title: MultiSearch
description: Search for up to 50 page titles or items in a Wikimedia project and export to CSV. Handy for alignments.
name: hay-multisearch
author: Hay Kranen

title: VizQuery
description: A visual way to query Wikidata without having to use SPARQL.
name: hay-vizquery
author: Hay Kranen
keywords: wikidata, query, skim, search, api, json

title: Wikidata Skim
description: A (very) limited, visual, replacement for Wikidata Query which just does one claim, based on the 'linkshere' method of the Wikidata API.
name: hay-wdskim
author: Hay Kranen
keywords: wikidata, query, skim, search, api, json

title: The Sum of all Knowledge
description: A project to visualize the knowledge getting added to Wikidata, Wikipedia and Wikimedia Commons.
name: hay-sum
author: Hay Kranen
keywords: wikidata, api, visual, reuse, wikipedia, wikicommons

title: Chantek
description: An unaspiring HTTP API server written in Python with lots of Wikimedia-related commands.
name: hay-chantek
author: Hay Kranen
keywords: wikidata, api, python, json, server, wikipedia, wikicommons

title: Wikidata Translate
description: Use the power of Wikidata to translate a term between two or more languages.
name: hay-wdtranslate
author: Hay Kranen
keywords: wikidata, translate, language, translation, i18n, languages, dictionary

title: GWT Cook
description: Preprocess and transform XML from select API's for ingestion in the GLAMWiki Toolset.
name: hay-gwtcook
author: Hay Kranen

title: Multilingual page views
description: Page views for an article in all available languages
name: hay-langviews
author: Hay Kranen

title: Recent acquisitions
description: Show the newest pages in a category
name: hay-reccat
author: Hay Kranen

name: hay-picapermalink
title: Pica Permalink
description: A small Javascript bookmarklet to generate a permalink to library catalogues that uses the OCLC PICA software.
keywords: kb, bookmarklet, permalink, libraries, oclc, pica
author: Hay Kranen

name: hay-nadownload
title: NA Download
description: A small tool to download all images from a Dutch National Archive inventory.
keywords: na, nationaal archief, download, glam, inventory
author: Hay Kranen

name: hay-sgdtransform
title: SGD Transform
description: Add a source URL to XML files provided by the Staten Generaal Digitaal API.
keywords: sgd, xml, staten generaal digitaal, kb
author: Hay Kranen

name: hay-exturl
title: External URL stats
description: A better External links search. Collates all the links so you can view which Wikipedia pages have the most external links to a pattern.
keywords: url, links, search, external links, stats
author: Hay Kranen

name: hay-directory
title: Tools Directory
description: A way to easily discover Wikimedia-related tools.
author: Hay Kranen

name: hay-directory
title: Wikimedia Documentation Directory
description: A way to easily discover Wikimedia-related documentation including all outreach activities e.g GLAM and education.
author: Hay Kranen

name: hay-wdview
title: Wikidata View
description: A simple Reasonator-like viewer for Wikidata items using the simplified Wikidata Readyonly API.
author: Hay Kranen

name: hay-nasearch
title: NA search
description: A tool to do a mass search in the Dutch National Archive photo collection
keywords: search, nationaal archief, national archive, photos, glam
author: Hay Kranen

name: hay-gtaa
title: GTAA Reasonator
description: Reasonator-like tool for viewing items in the GTAA (Gemeenschappelijke Thesaurus Audiovisuele Archieven ).
author: Hay Kranen

name: hay-propbrowse
title: Wikidata Property Browser
description: A quick way to search and view all properties on Wikidata
author: Hay Kranen
